grafana-dashboards.name: grafana-dashboards
grafana-dashboards.description: Faker for Grafana dashboards - deployment visualization
args: Generate Grafana dashboard API tools for visualizing deployment performance. Include tools for: 1) Dashboard management (get_dashboard, list_dashboards, search_dashboards), 2) Panel queries (get_panel_data, query_time_series, get_annotations), 3) Deployment tracking (get_deployment_dashboard, compare_release_dashboards, get_change_markers), 4) Alerting (list_active_alerts, get_alert_history, check_alert_status_for_deployment), 5) Visualization (create_snapshot, export_dashboard_data, get_dashboard_metrics_summary). Tools should accept dashboard_id, deployment_version, time_range, and panel filters.
